Web Remote Volume Control is enabled. Connect to below address to start controlling sound volume remotely.
Web Remote Volume Control is disabled. Press the button below to start the service.
Web Remote Volume Control

Enter the port on which the service will start:
The default port is 9090, this adjustment is optional.

This is just a simple authentication method to prevent unauthorized access.
Enter the secret key you want to use below:
Auth
Verify that you are connected to your local network (Wifi) and restart the application.
This application limits itself to local network IP addresses (192.168.*.*, 10.*.*.*, or 172.16.0.0 to 172.31.255.255).
Volume remote control is disabled. Unable to find a local network IP address.
Auto Mode
ImageButton with a question mark symbol, which describes the Auto Mode.
The Automatic mode, when enabled, allows the application to start automatically after the system boots. Web Remote Volume Control will launch without requiring manual input.
